title: Primitive - Security Repurchase Transaction
description: Abstract object describing common properties to a repurchase transaction

price.description: Repurchase price per share of the stock

quantity.description: Number of shares of stock repurchased

consideration.description: Consideration for the repurchase of the stock

resulting_security_ids.title: Security Repurchase - Resulting Security ID Array
resulting_security_ids.description: For partial repurchases, list of security id(s) of the resulting stock objects holding any remaining shares
